str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To remember, call to mind, recall, mention. A prolonged form of mnaomai; to remind, i.e. to recall to mind.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
(a) of time: still, yet, even now, (b) of degree: even, further, more, in addition. Perhaps akin to etos; 'yet, ' still.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
Roving, i.e. an impostor or misleader.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I wake, arouse, (b) I raise up. Probably akin to the base of agora; to waken, i.e. Rouse.
